summary: When conditions are right an infamous ice-skating race is held in the north of the Netherlands. The 200 km race must be completed by midnight and everyone who finishes receives a medal. ... See full summary »
cast: Willeke van Ammelrooy|Pierre Bokma|Kees Prins|Chantal Janzen|Cas Jansen|Cees Geel|Dirk Zeelenberg|Peggy Vrijens|Peter Tuinman|Dennis Overeem|Chava Voor in 't Holt|Lottie Hellingman|Herman Otten|Chris Zegers|Jos Bertens|Rense Westra|Robbert Blokland|Hilbert Dijkstra|Klemens Patijn|Fedde Hoekstra|Jan Douwe Kroeske|Yannick Noomen|Joop Wittermans|Tim Douwsma|Edwin Evers|Daniel Bokma|Lourens van den Akker|Bettiena Bekkema|Dennis Faber|Marco Overeem|Elmar Düren|Henk Angenent|Bob de Jong|Henk Gemser|Wiebe Wieling|Chiem Bokma|Joonas Makkonen
title: De hel van '63
